name: Chambermaid
ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two alive players. Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of those players that woke tonight due to their ability.

otherNights.description: Each night, choose 2 alive players: learn how many of them woke tonight due to their ability.
